front.title: Pre-Authentication Support for the Protocol for Carrying Authentication for Network Access (PANA)

abstract.t: This document defines an extension to the Protocol for Carrying Authentication for Network Access (PANA) for proactively establishing a PANA Security Association between a PANA Client in one access network and a PANA Authentication Agent in another access network to which the PANA Client may move. This document defines an Experimental Protocol for the Internet community.
